SELECT T1.promoter_id, T1.pmtLoginId, T1.pmtLoginPw, T1.pmFirstName, T1.pmLastName, T1.pmtGender, T1.pmtNickName, T1.pmtCellularPhone, T1.pmtMail, T1.pmtZipcode, T1.pmtAddress, T1.pmtAddressDetail, T1.pmtMark , T2.staff_id, T7.stfName, T2.pmtUpperPromoter_id, T2.pmtRcmderId, T2.pmtLevel, T2.pmtVisitNbr, T2.pmtEffects, T2.pmtProfits, T2.pmtGoodsGroup, T2.pmtJoinDt, T2.pmtUpdateDt, T2.pmtLeaveDt, T2.pmtLevel, T2.pmtRecentLoginDt , T4.pmtCompany, T4.pmtBizLicenseNo, T4.pmtCorpLicenseNo, T4.pmtBizType, T4.pmtBizLine, T4.pmtBizPhone, T4.pmtBizZipcode, T4.pmtBizAddress, T4.pmtBizAddressDetail , T5.pmtChannelType, T5.pmtChannelId, T5.pmtChannelName, T5.pmtChannelDesc, T5.pmtChannelURL, T5.pmtChannelMember, T5.pmtChannelDaillyVisit , T6.pmtBankName, T6.pmtBankAccount, T6.pmtBankbookFileImage, T6.pmtBankInsertDt FROM Promoter_tbl T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN PromoterValue_tbl T2 ON T1.promoter_id = T2.Promoter_tbl_promoter_id LEFT OUTER JOIN PromoterLicense_tbl T4 ON T1.promoter_id = T4.Promoter_tbl_promoter_id LEFT OUTER JOIN PromoterChannel_tbl T5 ON T1.promoter_id = T5.Promoter_tbl_promoter_id LEFT OUTER JOIN PromoterAccount_tbl T6 ON T1.promoter_id = T6.Promoter_tbl_promoter_id LEFT OUTER JOIN Staff_tbl T7 ON T2.staff_id = T7.staff_id WHERE T1.promoter_id = #{promoter_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Promoter_tbl (promoter_id, pmtLoginId, pmtLoginPw, pmFirstName, pmLastName, pmtGender, pmtNickName , pmtCellularPhone, pmtMail, pmtZipcode, pmtAddress, pmtAddressDetail, pmtMark) VALUES((SELECT IFNULL(max(pmt.promoter_id)+1,100000) FROM Promoter_tbl pmt), #{pmtLoginId}, #{pmtLoginPw}, #{pmFirstName}, #{pmLastName}, #{pmtGender}, #{pmtNickname} , #{pmtCellularPhone}, #{pmtMail}, #{pmtZipcode}, #{pmtAddress}, #{pmtAddressDetail}, #{pmtMark})

INSERT INTO PromoterValue_tbl(promoter_id, staff_id, pmtLevel, pmtVisitNbr, pmtEffects, pmtProfits, Promoter_tbl_promoter_id) SELECT promoter_id, CASE WHEN LENGTH(#{staff_id}) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE #{staff_id} END, 1, 0, 0, 0, promoter_id FROM Promoter_tbl WHERE pmtLoginId = #{pmtLoginId}

INSERT INTO PromoterValueLog_tbl(promoterValueLog_id, promoter_id, pvlChagedPoint, pvlRemark, pvlInsertDt, pvlIpAddress, PromoterValue_tbl_promoter_id) SELECT (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(promoterValueLog_id)+1, 10000000) FROM PromoterValueLog_tbl), promoter_id, 0, #{pvlRemark}, NOW(), #{pvlIpAddress}, promoter_id FROM Promoter_tbl WHERE pmtLoginId = #{pmtLoginId}

INSERT INTO PromoterSpecialty_tbl(promoterSpecialty_id, promoter_id, pmtSpecialtyName, Promoter_tbl_promoter_id)
SELECT (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(promoterSpecialty_id)+1, 1000000)+#{index} FROM PromoterSpecialty_tbl), promoter_id, #{specialty}, promoter_id FROM Promoter_tbl WHERE pmtLoginId = #{pmtLoginId}

INSERT INTO PromoterLicense_tbl(promoter_id, pmtCompany, pmtBizLicenseNo, pmtCorpLicenseNo, pmtBizType, pmtBizLine, pmtBizPhone, pmtBizZipcode, pmtBizAddress, pmtBizAddressDetail, Promoter_tbl_promoter_id) SELECT promoter_id, #{pmtCompany}, #{pmtBizLicenseNo}, #{pmtCorpLicenseNo}, #{pmtBizType}, #{pmtBizLine}, #{pmtBizPhone}, #{pmtBizZipcode}, #{pmtBizAddress}, #{pmtBizAddressDetail}, promoter_id FROM Promoter_tbl WHERE pmtLoginId = #{pmtLoginId}

INSERT INTO PromoterChannel_tbl(promoterChannel_id, promoter_id, pmtChannelType, pmtChannelId, pmtChannelName, pmtChannelDesc, pmtChannelURL, pmtChannelMember, pmtChannelDaillyVisit, Promoter_tbl_promoter_id) SELECT (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(promoterChannel_id)+1, 100000) FROM PromoterChannel_tbl), promoter_id, #{pmtChannelType}, #{pmtChannelId}, #{pmtChannelName}, #{pmtChannelDesc}, #{pmtChannelURL}, #{pmtChannelMember}, #{pmtChannelDaillyVisit}, promoter_id FROM Promoter_tbl WHERE pmtLoginId = #{pmtLoginId}

INSERT INTO PromoterAccount_tbl(promoter_id, pmtBankName, pmtBankAccount, Promoter_tbl_promoter_id) SELECT promoter_id, #{pmtBankName}, #{pmtBankAccount}, promoter_id FROM Promoter_tbl WHERE pmtLoginId = #{pmtLoginId}
